stories.headline: UN Security Council Adopts New Climate Action Framework
stories.summary: Member states approved a binding resolution to accelerate emissions cuts and aid vulnerable nations, marking a significant step towards global climate goals.

stories.headline: Major US AI Firm Releases Ethical Guidelines for Advanced AI
stories.summary: A leading US AI developer published a comprehensive framework for safe and responsible AI, aiming to set industry standards amid growing concerns.

stories.headline: East African Nations Deploy Peacekeeping Force to Sudan Border
stories.summary: Regional bloc forces entered a disputed zone to stabilize escalating tensions and protect civilians following recent clashes.

stories.headline: Global Health Initiative Reports Success in Asia Malaria Vaccine Rollout
stories.summary: A major public health campaign has significantly reduced malaria cases in pilot regions across Asia, offering hope for broader eradication.

stories.headline: EU Parliament Approves Landmark Digital Services Tax on Tech Giants
stories.summary: The new tax aims to ensure fair contribution from large digital companies operating within the EU, potentially reshaping global corporate taxation.
